entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain or drizzle early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
